title: Ep 423 | Jase Warns Against a New God & Knowledge as a Weapon
description:
Jase describes the worship of information and how it's being raised up as a cultural god. Phil remembers the Ivy League schools' origins as places of preaching. Al and Jase break down the purpose of idols and why people adopt them. Al explains the difference between hoping and loving. And Jase warns against the weaponization of knowledge among believers and non-believers.
